Description: Your train had some delay, we can take the bus, subway or next train, they all take about the same time.
To get home, we can take the bus, subway or next train, they all take about the same time, price is equal-ish too. Walking is also an option, but takes a bit longer.

It was freezing last night, so I woke you up half an hour early to make sure you are on time. Hope you slept well. Prepare for a cold and sunny day: clear the ice of your windows and don't forget your gloves and sunglasses.
